article_title: Woman Arrested For Faking Her Daughter's Cancer Diagnosis To Collect Donations
article_text: An Oklahoma bill that could send any doctor who performs an abortion to jail headed to the governor on Thursday, with opponents saying the measure is unconstitutional and promising a legal battle against the cash-strapped state if it is approved.

article_metadata.news_keywords: child, cancer, hoax, woman, arrested, faking, her, daughters, cancer, diagnosis, collect

og.description: Juanita Garcia allegedly made up a very serious diagnosis for personal gain.
